name: Solomon (ReKylee)
description:
A Metroidvania centered around the idea of losing a loved one- the consequences and the ambivalent state one can be at, realizing no one can control their emotions.

Provided to you by At The Masquerade Team.

Credits:

Programming - K.C.( https://twitter.com/KyleeDev), Itay raz(https://twitter.com/EksDeeeeeeee).

Writing - Ithamar Caspi

Team Logo - Cin. https://twitter.com/CinDoesArt

Cover art - Eden Ayzenberg

Character art - Ofir Lahav, Eden Ayzenberg.
